title: Columns (Flexible)
description: Add markdown separated into two or more columns, with configurable sizing.

fields.name: ratio
fields.title: Specify a ratio for the columns, like '1:3' or '3:5:3'. The ratio must match the number of columns used.

fields.name: first-column-text
fields.title:
First Column Text:

Write any valid Markdown, including additional shortcodes/snippets.

fields.name: remaining-columns-text
fields.title:
Remaining Text: As with the first column text, add any additional markdown.

To add another column, specify a blank line before and after this text:
<--->
The text following the column notation will be in a new column.

fields.name: flattenInMobileView
fields.title: Should be flattened to single stacked column in mobile view
